features.featureTitle: Replace the current generated 'Q' monogram placeholder in the site header with the uploaded QH monogram logo image (saved as frontend/public/assets/generated/qh-logo.png). Display it as the left-aligned logo lockup in the Header component. The logo must be sized appropriately for the fixed header (height ~40–48px on desktop, ~32px on mobile), and must render on the dark header background without a white box or border — use the transparent-background version of the asset. Alongside the monogram, retain or add the 'Quindore Holdings LLC' wordmark text in Playfair Display to its right.
